App Name: OneCut
Package Name: com.tqyspbj.videocut

Brief: OneCut is a versatile video editing app designed to bring your micro video content to life with fun and interactive elements. Whether you're looking to add an expressive touch with stickers, personalize with text, or enhance with music, OneCut offers a user-friendly platform to unleash your creativity on videos with just a few taps.
